snippet: A retired New York high school librarian and a New Jersey auto mechanic were convicted of plotting to kidnap, rape, torture and kill women and girls.
abstract: Michael Van Hise, retired New York high school librarian, and Christopher Asch, New Jersey auto mechanic, are convicted in federal court in Manhattan of scheming to carry out gruesome fantasies of kidnapping, raping, torturing and killing women and girls; verdicts come one year after New York Police Officer Gilberto Valle was convicted for plotting abductions and cannibalism.
lead_paragraph: A retired New York high school librarian and a New Jersey auto mechanic were convicted of plotting to kidnap, rape, torture and kill women and girls.

headline.main: 2 Guilty in Plot to Kidnap, Torture and Kill Women
headline.print_headline: 2 Guilty in Plot to Kidnap, Torture and Kill Women
